scripts.test:cov: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL RMF_API_SERVER_TEST_COVERAGE=1 pipenv run python -m coverage run -p -m unittest && pipenv run python -m coverage combine
scripts.test:report: pipenv run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.test:migration: cd test_migration && pipenv run aerich upgrade
